p: The cryo-EM structure of MNV was determined to a cryo-EM resolution of ~8Ã… [ 56, 61]. The obvious difference between this structure and the crystal structure of human Norwalk virus (NV) [ 56, 61] was that the P domains of NV VLPs rest upon the shell domain, while there is a large gap in the electron density between the shell and protruding domains of MNV-1 ( Figure 4). This gives the appearance that the MNV-1 P domains lift off the shell (S domains) to form a second proteinacous layer. As shown in this figure, there is a linker region between the S and P domains that is coiled up in NV and becomes extended in MNV.
